definition: real men do not easily cry (idiom)
pinyin: nan2 er2 you3 lei4 bu4 qing1 tan2

definition: male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)

sentences.english: As the saying goes, "Men only weep when deeply hurt".
sentences.chinese: 俗話說，‘男兒有淚不輕彈，皆因未到傷心處’嘛。
